testcase.name: renders a Typeahead when layout class is typeahead
loads typeahead options when layout class is typeahead and no possible values are specified
maps answer object value to string label for the typeahead component
shows input with text value of the answer when no layout class is specified
renders date picker with answer value when date layout class is specified
renders time picker with answer value when time layout class is specified
renders datetime picker with answer value when datetime layout class is specified
renders datetime picker with answer value when no layout class is specified and numeric answer value is used
renders checkbox with answer value when checkbox layout class is specified
renders numeric input with answer value when number layout class is specified
renders textarea for answer with long value
renders masked input for question with masked-input layout class
